From this album, the single "Die Frau mit dem Gurt" reached number 27 on the German hit parade. Another song on the album, "Ich möchte so gern Dave Dudley hör’n" ("I Would Like So Much to Hear [[Dave Dudley]]"), reached number nine on the German single hit parade in April 1978. The band earned number one placement with the singles "Der wilde, wilde Westen" and "Old Texas Town" in 1980 and 1981.{{cite web | url=http://www.country.de/2008/10/30/truck-stop/ | title=Truck Stop (Biografie), Stefan Leibeling | date=October 30, 2008 | accessdate=July 21, 2013}} In their 50 year tenure, the band have released 40 albums plus anniversary compilations, and dozens of singles. == References == {{Reflist}} == External links == {{Commons|Category:Truck Stop|Truck Stop}} * [http://www.truck-stop.de Official website in German] * [http://www.country.de/2008/10/30/truck-stop Umfangreiche Biografie der Bandmitglieder] auf country.de {{Authority control}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Truck Stop}} [[Category:German country music groups]] {{Germany-band-stub}}
